headline: Equinix Inc (NASDAQ:EQIX) Reports Strong Q4 2025 Earnings Beat and Raises Dividend
summary: Equinix's Q4 2025 results beat EPS estimates, raised its dividend, and provided a robust 2026 outlook, driving positive investor sentiment.

headline: Equinix (EQIX) Misses Q4 FFO and Revenue Estimates
summary: Equinix (EQIX) delivered FFO and revenue surprises of -1.74% and -1.96%, respectively, for the quarter ended December 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Equinix Revenue Upgrade Highlights AI Data Center Push In India And Indonesia
summary: Equinix (NasdaqGS:EQIX) has raised its annual revenue outlook, citing stronger demand for data centers supporting artificial intelligence workloads. The company is expanding into India and Indonesia with new facilities in Chennai and Jakarta, aiming to broaden its global footprint. For investors watching digital infrastructure, Equinix sits at the center of growing demand for data center capacity tied to AI adoption. The stock trades at $856.74, with a 7.0% return over the past 30 days and...

headline: Equinix forecasts annual sales above estimates on AI data center demand
summary: Equinix forecast annual revenue above estimates on Wednesday, betting on strong artificial intelligence-linked ‌demand for the largest data center operator's services, ‌sending its shares up over 6% in extended trading.  As corporations race ​to integrate generative AI, the surge in demand for specialized data centers to power the technology has benefited Equinix.  The company expects revenue between $10.12 billion and $10.22 billion for 2026, ‌compared with estimates ⁠of $10.07 billion, according to data compiled by LSEG.

headline: Equinix: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The average estimate of nine analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for funds from operations of $9.07 per share. Funds from operations is a closely watched measure in the REIT industry. It takes net income and adds back items such as depreciation and amortization.

raw.headline: Equinix: Q4 Earnings Snapshot

headline: Equinix Increases Quarterly Dividend on Its Common Stock for 11th Consecutive Year Since REIT Conversion
summary: Equinix, Inc. (Nasdaq: EQIX), the world's digital infrastructure company®, today announced that its Board of Directors has declared a quarterly cash dividend of $5.16 per share on its common stock. The quarterly common stock dividend will be paid on March 18, 2026, to shareholders of record on February 25, 2026.

headline: Equinix Q4 FFO $8.91 Beats $8.85 Estimate, Sales $2.420B Miss $2.461B Estimate
summary: Equinix (NASDAQ:EQIX) reported quarterly earnings of $8.91 per share which beat the analyst consensus estimate of $8.85 by 0.71 percent. This is a 12.5 percent increase over earnings of $7.92 per share from the same
